name: Winding Path
description:
Pitch

Players will have the opportunity to dive into a dream.

The dream of an anxious person, but also with a wandering soul, whether it is the deep sea or the dark corridors of catacombs, places will have few links. But more than that, they will not be as one might imagine.

Surrealism is at the center of this experience.

Gameplay

Winding path is a virtual reality game in which the players will have to solve puzzles in various environments that will change according to his progress. The players will have several possible paths to allow them a certain freedom of exploration, as long as they finds the hidden “doors”.

There will also be a sandbox aspect in each level.

Credits

PRODUCER : Pierre Arvis

GAME DESIGNER :François Loing

PROGRAMMER : Romain Habib, Paul Leduc, Loïck Gombauld

ARTIST : Merri Le chevanton, Pauline Roy
